lib.jog

Class graphics.Quad

  • java.lang.Object
    • lib.jog.graphics.Quad
  • Enclosing class:
    graphics

    public static class graphics.Quad
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a quad for drawing rectangular sections of images.
    Author:
    IMP1

    • Constructor Detail

      • graphics.Quad

        private graphics.Quad(double x,
             double y,
             double w,
             double h,
             double imgWidth,
             double imgHeight)
        Constructor for Quad.
        Parameters:
        x - the beginning horizontal coordinate of the quad in pixels.
        y - the beginning vertical coordinate of the quad in pixels.
        w - the width in pixels of the quad.
        h - the height in pixels of the quad.
        imgWidth - the width of the image the quad will be a part of.
        imgHeight - the height of the image the quad will be a part of.
